title: Havent recieved a chest in months even with grades s or higher
body: Its been months since iv'e received a chest, i have gotten a s rank multiple times and also had plenty of games were my team mates got a s+ and i still didn't get a chest. I also have played multiple champions and still nothing. I receive keys but not chest ad i believe its been at least 4 months. I have over 15 keys but nothing to use them on. Ill receive keys but not chest. I've messaged riot multiple times but never get a response plz help!!!!!

replies.body: Looks like you've been consistently playing Ziggs and Jinx. You've already earned a chest with Jinx, but you should still be able to get one with Ziggs. It doesn't look like you've gotten an S with Ziggs yet though, and keep in mind you can only have [**4 chests available at any given time**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233). Each chest will become available again 7 days after the first one locked.

Hi so i dont know if im checking right but looked over my jinx icon and it shows no chest earned its also been months. I just started playing ziggs little over a week ago and fell in love i also was playing lux allot along with couple others.
